column5: For some of us, the feeling of being full or stuffed calms down severe anxiety and stress. For some of us we eat to relax like others drink alcohol to relax. Not all are focused on the taste so much as be being focused on that feeling of fullness. An unhealthy way to deal with anxiety of course, but one has to learn better ways to cope with their emotions.

These medications affect certain parts of our brains and they often require a delicate balancing of each medicine to improve the mental health concerns. Please do not increase your meds without your drs approval.
